name: Arden-CL Backpack Archangel
name_cn: 阿尔登-SL背包 大天使
description:
Item Type: Light Backpack
Carrying Capacity: 40K µSCU
Core Compatibility: All
Whether carrying supplies into a combat zone or simply hauling extra gear, the Arden-CL backpack is battle ready and tested. Roussimoff Rehabilitation Systems designed the backpack with a universal core connector allowing it to attach to a wide variety armors.
description_cn:
物品类型：轻型背包
储物空间：40K µSCU
可适配胸甲类型：全部
无论是携带补给进入战斗区，还是容纳额外的装备，久经沙场的阿尔登-CL背包都已做好战斗准备。努西莫夫复原系统为该背包设计了一个通用胸甲连接器，能够与各种不同护甲兼容。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-Skutters_GrimHex
